alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 9:59AM CDT until September 02 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Greene and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.5 feet Monday morning. It will then begin to gradually fall, falling below flood stage by early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
